content: All winning combinations are paid from left to right except the FREE SPINS. In the case where the WILD symbol creates multiple prize combinations within the same winning line, only the most beneficial win for the player is awarded. In case of combinations consisting exclusively of Wild symbols, it will be paid as the highest symbol..
Any malfunctions will cancel all bets and payouts

wording.Text: This game has a theoretical RTP of:
In case of malfunction, the play and the eventual win will be canceled.

The maximium value of the prize is limited to 5.000x the bet in both the main game and FREESPINS. If the prize of the total rounds hits 5000x the bet, the round finishes. The prize is awarded and all the FREE SPINS left are removed.

featureContent.content: Substitutes all symbols, except the FREE SPINS symbol
3 or more symbols scattered across the reels, pay a prize and award the bonus FREE SPINS.

content: In the case of multiplier feature trigger, the award order is the following:
1 - Winning lines prizes;
2 - FREE SPINS.
In this bonus the player must select one of the star to reveal the FREE SPINS Multiplier.
If the player makes no choice, after a few seconds one of the options will be selected automatically.
The FREE SPINS game starts with 10 spins and during the game the player has the possibility to win 10 more spins. With a maximum of 100 spins in total.
During FREE SPINS game the multiplier is applied to both winnings and extra spins.

featureContent.content: With some symbol combinations you can win extra spins and play them without paying additional credits. During the extra spins phase the bet can also be changed.

content: The player can see the Start button changing and start the increment of extra spins available. The game will auto play after 10 seconds the player doesnt press the button START.
The extra spins are always played after the presentation of all the outcome of the previous spin.
The player must select a card, red or black, to see what is on the other side. If an x2 is displayed the player can double their prize.
If a X is displayed the player loses their prize. The player can only double their prize ONCE. At any time, the player can collect their winnings by pressing the TAKE button.
The game will auto exit the risk phase no action is made by the player. The player can access the Double Up game by pressing the RISCHIA button at the play end.
If the autoplay option is enabled, the double up game will be skipped at the play end.
Wins over 10.000x the initial bet cannot be doubled.
The double up game RTP is 100%
SUPER FREE SPINS are activated if there are 3 or more SCATTERS on the reels and if there is a SUPER SCATTER on the last reel.

SUPER FREE SPINS follow the same logic as normal FREE SPINS as explained on the previous pages, but with one particularity, there is always 1 or more GUARANTEED COLLECTORS and the prize outputs are potentialy bigger.
The player can select the option of DOUBLE CHANCE, paying 1.25x the bet, where the chance to win FREE SPINS naturally is doubled.
When this feature is enabled the buy FREE SPINS and SUPER FREE SPINS feature is disabled.
CRISTAL SHOP gives direct access to the game features. These features can only be activated in the base game.
Discover the thrill of FEATURE slot: 3 FREE SPINS, with WILD MULTIPLIERS (x2 to x5). Take it to the next level with 3 FREE SPINS of the SUPER FEATURE - more chances for big wins!

HUNTER MODE is an enhanced and accelerated AUTOPLAY feature exclusively available in games developed by CRISTALTEC. This mode is designed to offer players a quicker and more intense gaming experience.

While in HUNTER MODE, the game utilizes the same game engine and logic as the regular gameplay, but the pace of the game is significantly faster. As a result of this increased speed, only the total winnings achieved per game round are displayed to the player. The detailed outcomes of individual spins or rounds are not shown.
FREE SPINS are triggered the HUNTER MODE is stopped automatically and an input from the player is required to proceed to the FREE SPINS.

It's worth noting that players have the flexibility to stop the HUNTER MODE at any moment during their gaming session. If they choose to do so, the total results of the current gaming session will be displayed after the ongoing game round is completed.
